attributes.action: Ban the sale of disposable Vapes for the environment and the nation's health
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to act now to save billions in future health care costs billions in environmental costs and has a moral responsibility to protect it's population from harm
attributes.background: Disposable Vaping is a health disaster that we are sleepwalking into. They shouldn't be sold at all, especially to under 18s. .Vapes contain many harmful toxins which will cause irreparable harm to a whole generation which will cost the government billions to treat in decades to come

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638536
